title: HELP . Typeface ID for SWASHY and HEAVY sets . . .
content:
blessings of the masses

+

blessings of the state

…

i return with humility . asking the eyes of the typographic experts here in these forums for help

in identifying the following typefaces .

.

these pages are from a magazine by the french design group WORK IN PROGRESS

.

in use is lubalin’s classic + misused AVANTGARDE . along with what i think might be another lubalin creation .

THE TYPEFACES WITH “SWASHY” CAPS . i think i may have seen it in an U&LC . but i forget .

i’m interested in the swash font in particular but

please id all fonts in play .

+

the second attached file has a heavy display type . WHAT IS IT ?

\_ \_ \_

peace + bless

aerosyn . lex

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [vi.png](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=vi.png) | 297.19 KB |
| [vi2.png](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=vi2.png) | 227.75 KB |
author: Aerosyn-Lex Mes...

comments.content:
_[vi.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074528/http:/typophile.com/system/files?file=vi.png) =_ ‘Caslon _( Swash )_’.?  
 _[vi2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074528/http:/typophile.com/system/files?file=vi2.png) =_ ‘Aachen’..

_( Thats one pretty strangely worded post, I would like to add.. :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074528/http:/www.formlos.net/)
Play also looks like it is Avant Guard Bold

_(Thats one pretty strangely worded post, I would like to add.. :)_

I just _love_ Aerosyn-Lex Mestrovic’s requests — they’re over-the-top slightly off-kilter poetic extravaganza. They’re the highlight of my Type Identification Board experience. Really.

RESPECT IN KIND .

Thank you all for your expert opinions .

I appreciate the focus .

…

So CASLON has a set of SWASH CAPS ?

I wasn’t aware of that but I’ll research that a bit more .

WOULD ANYONE BE ABLE TO RECOMMEND A SIMILAR “SWASHED” DISPLAY TYPE ?

something like BELLO but less “SIGNAGE’Y” ? ? ?

+

TROUBLEMAN . my thanks and praise . peace be with you .

+

Aerosyn-Lex . BKLYN . NYC

: : : : : : : : : : :

. : : : B L O O D . I S . T H E . N E W . B L A C K : : : .
Aerosyn-Lex, lets hope blood isn’t the new black, too much of it is being spilled in the middle east, and oh, in our own neighborhoods.
